trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a column type is visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> designer.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se um tipo de coluna está visível no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> designer.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: By default, types derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> appear in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control-specific parts of the Visual Studio designer, but inherit a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute> of <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.No> to prevent them from appearing in other parts of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, os tipos que derivam de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>são apresentados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>partes de controlo específicos do designer Visual Studio, mas herdar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute>de <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.No>para impedir que no outras partes do designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.No> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: This is necessary because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> type implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> interface, which normally makes an instance of the type appear in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Isto é necessário porque o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>Escreva implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>interface, o que normalmente faz com que uma instância do tipo de aparecer no designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: Use this attribute to prevent a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> type from appearing in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control-specific designer.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este atributo para impedir que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>tipo a apresentação no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>designer específicas do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a utilização de atributos, consulte [atributos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> class using the default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"> </xref> utilizar a predefinição de classe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>valor da propriedade de <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> class using the specified value to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*> property.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"> </xref> classe com o valor especificado para inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> value, which is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Yes"></xref>, indicating that the column is visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> designer.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"> </xref> valor, o que é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Yes"> </xref>, que indica que a coluna está visível no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> designer.

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A> property value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esta instância de atributo tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>valor da propriedade de `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this object is equivalent to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se este objeto é equivalente ao objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>A comparar com a atual <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the specified object is a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> instance with the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*> property value as this instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que o objeto especificado é um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"> </xref> instância com o mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>valor de propriedade que esta instância; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o código hash para esta instância.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash de número inteiro com sinal de 32 bits.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this attribute instance is equal to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"></xref> attribute value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esta instância de atributo é igual a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"> </xref> valor de atributo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that this instance is equal to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"></xref> instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que esta instância é igual a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"> </xref> instância; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> value indicating that the column is not visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"> </xref> valor que indica que a coluna não está visível no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> designer.

trans-unit.target: Esta instância de atributo tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>valor da propriedade de `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>
